abstract: Yahoo warned shareholders Thursday not to trust the “odd couple” of Microsoft and Carl C. Icahn. The three entities are embroiled in a proxy fight for control of Yahoo’s board.
snippet: Yahoo warned shareholders Thursday not to trust the “odd couple” of Microsoft and Carl C. Icahn. The three entities are embroiled in a proxy fight for control of Yahoo’s board.
lead_paragraph: In the  latest salvo in the proxy fight for control of Yahoo, the company is urging shareholders to beware of the “odd couple” — Microsoft and the corporate raider Carl C. Icahn — who are locked in a “marriage of convenience” but have no clear plan for what they would do if they took control of the board.

headline.main: The New ‘Odd Couple': Microsoft and Icahn
